title: 2007 Lantern Parade
creator_credit: Paul Bray, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Paul Bray talks about the beauty of the Lantern Parade, an event he has participated in since 2005. He considers the affect parades have on the community and the collective sense of joy and wellbeing.
